Name: 1st District
Description: The central district of Ilion, featuring commercial streets, public offices, and cultural venues.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A primarily residential area with schools, parks, and community spaces.

Name: 3rd District
Description: An area known for its modern developments and expanding infrastructure.

Name: 4th District
Description: A quieter district with a mix of traditional and modern housing, offering easy access to parks and schools.

Name: 5th District
Description: A developing area featuring new housing projects and improving infrastructure.
